h2_title: Yaksha King Boss Fight and Guide
img_above_text:
# Yaksha King

Yaksha King is one of the Yaoguai Kings you'll need to fight at the end of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. He's the final boss of the Chapter, so expect a challenging fight.


This fight will begin immediately after finishing the fight against Red Boy.

## Yaksha King Boss Fight and Guide
img_below_text: The Yaksha King will draw two blades from his elbows, which will be angled behind him for the fight. These will glow brightly, and he'll use them traditionally as blades, but also be able to throw our circular projectiles from them.
